Copying the folder the program is installed to doesn't mean that it will work on any other computer.... There are plenty of required DLLs and other files required to make it run. Do you really think that WMP12 is only 2.14 MB :/
I think it only work on windows 7
You made a copy of an already installed program from a folder in your computer...I sugest if you have the WMP 12 installation disc that you instead try making an ISO file from that.
player 12 comes installed with Windows 7, there cannot be a download as there are none. Though I wish there were.
